permitHolder: YOUNG MENS/YOUNG WOMENS HEBREW ASSOCIATION OF THE BRONX

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had age appropriate immunizations unless a child is exempt
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Appropriate outdoor play area not provided or maintained at the time of inspection
Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Appropriate outdoor play area not provided or maintained at the time of inspection
